comment:
* Special case of TranslateAnimation that translates only vertically, picking up the
 * horizontal values from whatever is set on the Transformation already. When used in
 * conjunction with a TranslateXAnimation, allows independent animation of x and y
 * position.
 * @hide

methods.name: protected void applyTransformation(float interpolatedTime, Transformation t)
methods.comment: * Calculates and sets y translation values on given transformation.

methodNames: protected void applyTransformation(float interpolatedTime, Transformation t)
